name: twitter  BlackCrow
description:
twitter ?? 
nope. 
it's a crow's caw
additional_info:
23-07-2014 First release.
07-08-2014 Fixed Color in retweet & fav icons when pressed.
04-08-2015 Fixed clear areas.
01-02-2017 Fixed Moments.
css:
/* Created by Antonio Ferreiro Ferrero AKA "a3cAnton" */
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);@-moz-document regexp("https://twitter.com(?!widget|cards).*"){li[class*="stream-item"]  [class*="promoted"],div[class="stream suggested-tweet-stream permalink-replies"]{display:none!important}*{outline:none!important}html,body,table,tbody,input[type=text],input[type=password],input[type="file"] > input[type="button"],input[type="file"] > input[type="text"],select,select > button,select > option,optgroup,textarea,button,input[type="file"] > button,[role="button"],[role="textbox"]{-moz-appearance:none!important;-webkit-appearance:none!important}html *:not(a):not(b):not([class*="Icon"]):not([class*="ProfileTweet-action"]):not([class*="-actionButton"]):not(.js-display-url){color:hsl(0,0%,60%)!important}a,a.twitter-timeline-link span.js-display-url,a.js-user-profile-link[class*="js-action"] .username:hover,a.pretty-link b{color:hsl(220,55%,55%)!important}a:hover,a:focus,a.twitter-timeline-link:hover span.js-display-url,a.js-user-profile-link[class*="js-action"]:hover strong.fullname{text-decoration:none!important;color:hsl(220,55%,65%)!important;text-shadow:0 0 6px hsla(220,55%,70%,.9)!important}.ProfileTweet-actionButton:hover {color:#593!important} [class*="count"]:not([class*="account"]),[class*="fullname"],a.js-user-profile-link[class*="js-action"]:not(:hover) strong.fullname{color:#bbf!important;font-weight:bold!important;text-shadow:1px 1px #000!important}  html:not(.mq-medium),html:not(.mq-medium) body,body[class*="user-style-"],body.nofooter,.tweet:hover,.ProfileTweet:hover,.dropdown-menu,.global-nav-inner,.content-header,.MatchItem:hover,.message,[class*="weet"]:hover html.mq-medium .Container,ul.typeahead-items,.DMInboxItem:hover,.DMInboxItem:hover [class^="DMInboxItem"],.PromptbirdPrompt,#profile-hover-container,.TwitterCard-container--clickable:hover,.StreamsFooter,.StreamsTopBar,.InStreamSignup,.InStreamLogin,.InStreamSignup .SignupCallOut,.InStreamLogin .LoginCallOut,.MomentFloatingMenu,.Streams-dividerText,.Streams-divider::before{background-color:hsl(0,0%,9%)!important}input,div[contenteditable="true"],input[type=text],input[type=password],textarea,[role="textbox"],[class*="footer"],[class*="stream-item"],[class*="bgUserColor"],[class*="box"],.module .flex-module,.CurrentMatches--withBackground,.DashboardProfileCard,.u-bgUserColorHover:hover,.u-bgUserColorHover:focus,.stream-end-inner,.modal-content,.SignupCallOut,.ProfileLifelineInfo,.ProfileCard,.WhoToFollow,.Trends,.dm-to,.dm-dialog div,.tweet,.ProfileTweet,.t1-select,html.mq-medium .Container,.content-main .expansion-container [class*="tweet"]:not(span),.WebToast,div [class^="front-sign"],div [class*="promptbird"],.Banner .flex-module,#phx-signup-form div.tos,.fast-signup .page-canvas,.RetweetDialog-commentBox,.DMActivity-container,.content-inner,.RelatedUsers,.DMActivity-body,.suggested-tweet-stream,.login-responsive .page-canvas,.login-responsive .mobile,.route-resend-password .mobile,.contact-support,.DMButtonBar,.TwitterCard .MomentCard,.MomentCapsuleSummary--card{background-color:hsl(0,0%,20%)!important}    [class*="Overlay"],.QuoteTweet--unavailable{background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.2)!important}  .count .count-inner{background-color:#f00!important}li,[class*="head"],.tweet:hover *:not(.dropdown-menu),.ProfileTweet:hover *:not(.dropdown-menu),span,.Icon,.ProfileSidebar .Footer .flex-module,iframe,.permalink,form,.thumbnail-container,.ProfileClusterFollow,.modal-header,.ProfilePopupContainer--bellbird .profile-social-proof,.profile-social-proof,.social-proof-label,.social-proof-label span,.ep-Campaign .ep-CampaignContainer,.DMNotice{background-color:transparent!important}.ProfileAvatar{background:none transparent!important}div,li,input[type=text],input[type=password],textarea,[role="textbox"],[class*="head"],[class*="footer"],[class*="stream"],[class*="item"],[class*="weet"],[class*="DashboardProfileCard"],li[class*="active"] a,[class*="box"],.module .flex-module,.CurrentMatches--withBackground,.ProfileAvatar,.stats,div [class^="front-sign"] h2,.TwitterCard-container{border-color:transparent!important}    .dropdown-caret .caret-inner{border-bottom:9px solid hsl(0,0%,9%)!important}.dropdown-divider,.WebToast{border-bottom:1px solid #000!important}li>a{border-width:0!important}a,div:not(.global-nav-inner):not(.content-header):not(.ProfileHeading-content),ul,li,textarea,button,.btn,.Streams-dividerText{border-radius:4px!important}input[type=text],input[type=password],[role="textbox"],[class*="count"]:not([class*="account"]):not(.stat-count){border-radius:25px!important}input[type=text],input[type=password],textarea,[role="textbox"],.tweet:hover,.ProfileTweet:hover,.MatchItem:hover,li[class*="active"] a,ul.ProfileNav-list li>a:hover,ul.js-global-actions li>a:hover,.Banner .flex-module{box-shadow:0 1px 5px 0 #000 inset,0 -1px 1px 0 hsl(0,0%,60%) inset!important}.tweet,.ProfileTweet,.MatchItem,ul.js-nav-links li,.thumbnail-container,div [class^="front-sign"] h2,.BirthdateSelect-button{box-shadow:0 1px 9px -3px hsla(0,0%,60%,.9) inset,0 -1px 6px 0 #000 inset!important}.global-nav-inner,.ProfileCanopy-navBar,.content-header,.ProfileHeading-content{box-shadow:0 1px 5px 0 #000!important}div[class*="footer"],.dm-to{box-shadow:none!important}.dropdown-menu,.modal-content,.ProfileAvatar,[class*="count"]:not([class*="account"]):not(.stat-count),.message,.WebToast{box-shadow:0 1px 5px 1px #000!important}.global-nav-inner,.content-header,.ProfileHeading-content,.ProfileCanopy-navBar,.new-tweets-bar,.btn:not(.topbar-tweet-btn),ul.js-nav-links li:not(.active)>a,.view-more-container,.BirthdateSelect-button,span[class*="Button--"],.Button--smallGray,.StreamsHero-buttonContainer .Button,.NotificationsHeadingContent,.MomentGuideNavigation.u-layer-top{background:transparent linear-gradient(180deg,hsl(0,0%,50%),hsl(0,0%,0%) 85%,hsl(0,0%,33%))!important}.new-tweets-bar:hover,.btn:hover,ul[role="menu"]>li:hover a,[role="menuitem"]:hover,ul.js-nav-links li:hover>a,ul.ProfileNav-list li>a:hover,ul.js-global-actions li:hover a,.view-more-container:hover,li.typeahead-item:hover a,.BirthdateSelect-button:hover,span[class*="Button--"]:hover,.Button--smallGray:hover,div.StreamsHero-image[style],.StreamsHero-buttonContainer .Button:hover,.MomentFloatingMenu button:hover{-moz-appearance:none;-webkit-appearance:none;background-color:transparent!important;background-image:radial-gradient(ellipse farthest-corner at center bottom,hsla(190,50%,55%,.8) 0%,transparent 99%),linear-gradient(180deg,hsl(0,0%,50%),hsl(0,0%,0%) 85%,hsl(0,0%,33%))!important}li[class*="active"] a,.GridTimeline-footerIcon{-moz-appearance:none;-webkit-appearance:none;background-color:transparent!important;background-image:radial-gradient(ellipse farthest-corner at center bottom,hsla(220,50%,55%,.8) 0%,transparent 99%),linear-gradient(180deg,hsl(0,0%,50%),hsl(0,0%,0%) 85%,hsl(0,0%,33%))!important}    html:not(.mq-medium),body[class]{background-repeat: repeat;background-attachment: fixed;background-image: url('https://abs.twimg.com/images/themes/theme14/bg.gif');}    .tweet,.ProfileTweet,.MatchItem,ul.js-nav-links li{margin-bottom:4px!important}[class*="count"]:not([class*="account"]){opacity:1!important}    .tweet,.ProfileTweet,#phx-signup-form .textbox{padding:6px!important}.nav.js-global-actions{padding:2px!important}#global-actions > li > a,#global-actions > li:hover > a,#global-actions > li.active > a{height:32px!important;margin-right:6px!important;padding:0px 8px!important}#global-actions > li > a span.Icon{margin-top:6px!important}}
